testsuite.name: pl.allegro.tech.build.axion.release.domain.ReleaserTest

testcase.name: should release new version when not on tag
should not release version when on tag
should release with forced pre-released versions
should not release version when on pre-released version tag
should create release commit if configured
should create release commit when on tag but forced

testsuite.system-out: Creating tag: release-2.0.0 Working on released version 1.0.0, nothing to release. Creating tag: release-3.0.0-rc4 Working on released version 3.0.0-rc4, nothing to release. Creating tag: release-3.0.1 Creating tag: release-3.0.0 Creating tag: release-3.2.0
